text:
This seems to a bug.

I use apache-1.3.33 on freebsd 5.2.1.
The problem is that trying to use Apache as a reverse proxy to an FTP site:
<VirtualHost *:80>
    DocumentRoot "/usr/local/www/data"
    ServerName my.domain.ru
    ProxyRequests       Off
    ProxyPass          /ftp ftp://localhost
    ProxyPassReverse   /ftp ftp://localhost
</VirtualHost>

In address bar in my browser I try - http://my.domain.ru/ftp
and that is ok, i see a list of files, but links to files is -
http:///ftp/file.txt instead of http://my.domain.ru/ftp/file.txt.

Is it a bug?
